title: Península House / Arquitetos Associados + BIRI
description: The design of this residence was developed in two distinct and complementary stages. Its construction began based on the original design, but due to specific circumstances generated by the COVID-19 pandemic, it was acquired by a new family, who carried out the necessary interventions to meet their demands.

title: Senyum Design places matte-black Jahten House overlooking jungle in Bali
description: Matte-black volumes frame views of the surrounding jungle "like a natural painting" at this house in Bali, Indonesia, designed by local architecture studio Senyum Design. Located on a large 3200-square-metre site in the coastal village of Kedungu, Jahten House is divided across two low-slung volumes connected by a ramped corridor that traverses the undulating landscape. title: Chairs For Sitting On Stairs
description: ARTA Architects has designed the Tai Kwun Chairs for The Hong Kong Jockey Club, allowing a more comfortable and modular seating solution for these stairs. title: This Modern Home Was Designed Around A Split-Trunk Oak Tree
